page.title: 18THE PIG FARM
page.content: The pig farm is behind the cheese dairy. The owner of the pig farm is Mr. Newell. The number of pigs and piglets altogether is about 450. The piglets are put into different huts as they grow older. When the pigs are old enough they go into the fattening shed to be fattened up for selling. They are sold at 5 months. Before you go into the fattening shed or the age huts field, you have to put your boots or shoes in liquid so that you don't spread diseases. Pigs catch diseases very quickly and then the pigs might die. The pigs eat the whey from the cheese dairy and they mix that with cereal mix. That is why the pig farm is at the back of the cheese dairy so the whey is near to the pigs. The pigs are weaned at three weeks.
